mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO RATESWAPCLOSINGCURVE (ID, CURVE_ID, CURVE_NAME, SECURITY_ID, SYMBOL, RATE, TRADE_DT, CREATE_TIME)
SELECT #{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.curveId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.curveName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.securityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.symbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.term,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.rate,jdbcType=FLOAT}, #{item.tradeDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=DATE} FROM DUAL
mapper.select: select count(1) from factor.RATESWAPCLOSINGCURVE where trade_dt = #{tradeDt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
